TopicTitle: Low frame rate? try this simple trick!

Articles.Content:
Im going to keep it simple with this one.

 

So I have no clue why, but ksp 2 makes debris very laggy, to the point where simply deleting non-important debris from the tracking station improved my fps from 10 to 40.

Hopefully this will be fixed soon, as I'm the kind of of guy to make a debris field around kerbin and don't delete any debris (1. Because I'm lazy.      2. Because I like the realism there in that there is a massive debris field around kerbin. )

Anyways, this helped me, but it might help some others, cheers!

Edited March 24, 2023 by Little 908
